alert.note: Alert for Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 05 at 10:40AM MDT until July 05 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 AM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL MEADE AND SOUTHEASTERN PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 1040 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wicksville, or 36 miles east of Rapid City, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported 60 mph winds at New Underwood SD. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Wall, New Underwood, Wasta, Scenic, Owanka, Wicksville, Curlew Lake and northern Badlands National Park. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 76 and 112. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Wind damage with this storm will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
